data.message:
Hi i was wondering if Simon could read some of my lyrics and offer me help in the right direction. I'm not a musician but believe I have a gift at poetry and lyrics I will forward some of my poems but this is a song I thought of and wrote in an hour and believe I can write songs about anything but don't know the first person to ask so who better than the man who knows. Thanks for reading my work and hope I can be shown the right direction.

                                                      F in lie (life)
I never asked to breathe this air
When I arrived,you wasn't there
Liquid life is all your share
I guess that's all,you had spare
You should of gone and grown a pair

You tried IVF, that's so sad
To be the dad,I never had
So excuse me,for being mad
The result came,it wasn't bad
God refused to replace,what you already had

                                               ( Chorus )

I should of been,the apple of your eye
Until the day that you die
But I was searching,reasons why
I wasn't included,in your F in lie  ( liFe )

Taunted,teased,abused at school
Having a dad,made all them cool
Gave authority,to be cruel
They all had a separate rule
I'm outnumbered,an innocent fool

A second chance,you had one day
But first you need,a DNA
Even that,I was made to pay
Yet again,you got your way
Mum was calm,on judgement day

I'm sorry I,was so much trouble
Have I just burst,your secret bubble
The minute you both,met your double

                          ( chorus )

Sill waiting for you,an open door
3 generations,you was four
Yet again,you chose to ignore
That door ain't open anymore

Imagine this feeling that I had
When my children,called me dad
My proudest moment,but im sad
It's a name,you've never had

Don't need that tear,from your eye
Because it's so fake,it's also dry
Now I don't need,your reasons why
They was written,in your eyes

                          ( chorus )

So you can take,your F in lie
A secret with you, when you die
I did my best,you didn't try
You have no choice,but accept why
I didn't turn up,or even cry
We already said, our last goodbye
You were never worth, that F in lie 

Hope my song was of interest I have many poems I will send if you wish to read them, I had a tough upbringing, with no father to guide and support me through life I never went to school so I'm self educated. I chose a life of drugs as I didn't know any right or wrongs, I had a 15 yr heroin addiction I have now overcome 8 yrs ago. I am now going blind due to a rare disease there is no treatment for. I dnt tell you these things for sympathy. I'm a proud man who lost my way I'm a unique character with the quickest one liners ever, I can read and judge a character within minutes I believe I'm very intelligent regardless of education.i only want my talent to be used and not wasted alongside my life and if I get a better future for myself and family it's all been worth it. So thanks for taking time to listen and read. I hope someone within your company or friends can assist me with my talents.thanks again il look forward to hearing from you. But no problem if I dnt hear
